organization.content:
Please identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Results in last of the group matches at the World Grand Prix badminton finals on Friday :

Let's think step by step.

1. World Grand Prix: This is the name of the badminton tournament. It is an organization that conducts the badminton finals.
2. Group matches: These are the preliminary matches played in smaller groups during the tournament. The organization responsible for the group matches is likely the World Grand Prix or the badminton governing body overseeing the event.
3. The World Grand Prix finals: This refers to the final stage of the tournament where the winners of each group advance to compete for the championship title. The World Grand Prix is the organization responsible for this stage as well.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Organization.
1. World Grand Prix: This is the organization responsible for conducting the badminton finals.
